import React, {useState} from "react"; import "../Styles/ProfileInfo.css"; export default function Info({ dispatch, profile, posts}){ const [onEdit, SetOnEdit] = useState(false) console.log(profile) return(
{ profile.length > 0 && profile.map((info) =>(
{/*
{user.friends.length}
*/}
FRIENDS
{/*
{user.following.length}
*/}
FOLLOWING

{info.fullName}

{info.username}
{/*
{post ? post.length : 0}
*/}
POSTS
)) }
) }
